pages.text: ke jab unhone un ke paas aa kar salaam kaha to unhone kaha ke hum ko to tum se dar lagta hai
unhone kaha daro nahi, hum tujhe ek saahebe ilm farzand ki bashaarat dete hai
kaha kya is bhudaape ke aa jaane ke baadh tum mujhe khush qabri dete ho! ye khush qabri tum kaise de rahe ho
unhone kaha hum aap ko bilkul sacchi khush qabri sunaate hai, aap mayoos logo mein shaamil na ho
kaha apne rab ta’ala ki rehmat se na ummid to sirf gumraah aur behke hoye log hee hote hai
pucha ke Allah ke bheje hoye (farishto!) tumhara aisa kya ehem kaam hai
unhone jawaab diya ke hum mujrim khaum ki taraf bheje gaye hai
magar khandaan looth ke, hum un sub ko to zaroor bacha lenge
sivayae us (looth) ki biwi ke, ke hum ne ose rukne aur baaqi reh jaane walo mein muqarrar kar diya hai
jab bheje hoye farishte aale looth ke paas pahonche
to unhone (looth alaihissalaam) ne kaha tum log to kuch anjaan se maloom ho rahe ho
unhone kaha nahi balke hum tere paas wo cheez laye hai jis mein ye log shak shuba kar rahe thein
hum to tere paas (sarih) haq laaye hai aur hai bhi bilkul sacche

ab tu apne khandaan sameth is raath ke kisi hisse mein chal de, aur aap un ke piche rehna aur (qabardaar) tum mein se koyi (piche) mud kar bhi na dekhe aur jahaan ka tumhe hukm kiya ja raha hai waha chale jaana
aur hum ne us ki taraf is baath ka faisla kar diya ke subah hote hote un logo ki jade kaat di jayengi
aur shahar waale khushiya manaate hoye aaye
(looth alaihissalaam ne) kaha ye log mere mehmaan hai, tum mujhe ruswa na karo
Allah ta’ala se daro aur mujhe ruswa na karo
wo bole kya hum ne tujhe dunya bhar (ki theke daari) se mana nahi kar rakha
